http://duncan-cragg.org/blog/post/getting-data-rest-dialogues/

"In an excl=
usive nine-part dialogue with an imaginary eBay Architect, 
we present an a=
ccessible discussion of the REST vs. SOA issue. 

Although eBay have what t=
hey call a 'REST' interface, it is, in fact, a 
STREST interface, and only =
works for one of the many function calls 
that they make available via SOAP=
 (GetSearchResults). 

In this dialogue series, I argue the case for eBay t=
o adopt a truly 
REST approach to their integration API."
